7.3 DUIM-Layouts Module

<single-child-composite-pane>

Open abstract class

Summary

The class of composite panes that can only have one child.

Superclasses

<layout>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

duim-layouts

Module

duim-layouts

Description

The class of composite panes that can only have one child.

Operations

None.

See also

<multiple-child-composite-pane>, page 475
